metadata.description: Cognitive Construct - A modular AI enhancement system comprising four skills for knowledge, reasoning, memory, and agency.

plugins.name: encyclopedia
plugins.description: Knowledge retrieval from multiple sources. Search docs, web, and code with intelligent routing via Context7, Exa, Perplexity, and Kagi.

plugins.name: inland-empire
plugins.description: Unified memory substrate. Store facts, patterns, and context across LibSQL, Mem0, and session storage. Query with remember, consult, and stats commands.

plugins.name: rhetoric
plugins.description: Structured reasoning and deliberation. Record thoughts with revision tracking, orchestrate multi-model debate, review thinking patterns and detect cognitive biases.

plugins.name: volition
plugins.description: Agency and execution. Edit code semantically via LSP, invoke LLMs across providers, search the web, and query security services.
